title: ‘SNL’ Season 51 Cast Confirmed, With Some Veterans Returning and a Handful of New Faces
summary: Despite reports of screen tests for potential new "Weekend Update" anchors, Colin Jost and Michael Che set to return for 12th season behind news desk.
body: As with just about every fall season at Studio 8H, it’s time to say welcome back to some of your favorite Saturday Night Live cast members, goodbye to a few others and good luck to the new faces in the mix. According to Variety , the cast lineup for the show’s upcoming 51st season will feature the return of popular cast members Bowen Yang, Ego Nwodim and Chloe Fineman, as well as Kenan Thompson, who will celebrate his record-breaking 23rd season on the show. Related Every ‘Saturday Night Live’ Cast Member Leaving & Joining the Show Ahead of Season 51 (Updating) 'Soda Pop' Choreographer Lee Jung Says She's Ready to Move From Saja Boys to BTS After Success of 'KPop Demon Hunters' 'Golden' Choreographer Jo Na-In 'Stunned & Thrilled' That 'KPop Demon Hunters' Song Topped Hot 100, Wants to Work With Lady Gaga Next And, after whispers that producer Lorne Michaels was screen-testing some new duos to possibly take over the “Weekend Update” desk, Variety reported that co-anchors Michael Che and Colin Jost will be back for their 12th season reading the news. Other returning cast members i…

title: ‘Saturday Night Fever’ to ‘KPop Demon Hunters’: Soundtracks With Three or More Hot 100 Top 10s
summary: KPop Demon Hunters is the first soundtrack to reel off at least three Hot 100 top 10s since 1997.
body: In the 1970s, ‘80s and ‘90s, many blockbuster movies were practically synonymous with the music featured in them or on their star-packed soundtracks. For some films, music was woven into their plots, making for a natural fit, such as the dance-floor odes Saturday Night Fever and Footloose . In other cases, musical superstars segued to onscreen starring roles — and did double duty by supplying memorable songs, such as Prince with Purple Rain and Whitney Houston with The Bodyguard and Waiting to Exhale . Meanwhile, Dirty Dancing became a vehicle for star Patrick Swayze to make his chart debut as a recording artist. Related Led by HUNTR/X’s ‘Golden’ at No. 1, ‘KPop Demon Hunters’ Becomes First Soundtrack With Four Simultaneous Hot 100 Top 10s Other soundtracks, such as two entries in the Beverly Hills Cop franchise, largely became collections of smash songs, more loosely bound by their cinematic ties. Not only did soundtrack songs enhance moviegoers’ experiences, but many became big hits on the Billboard Hot 100 , with multiple soundtracks generating three or more top 10s. By the 2000s, the flow of soundtracks packed with hits had stalled. A Billboard story in 2004 outlined vari…

title: Billboard’s Music Industry Events Calendar
summary: A complete rundown of the most important events across the music business.
body: As part of our continuing efforts to serve the music industry and its creators, Billboard Pro now features a music industry events calendar for readers. The calendar will act as music’s most complete summary major national and international industry events, from conferences to festivals to networking mixers and more. Just as Billboard is music’s must-read source for news, charts and analysis, now it also is the go-to for business happenings. Related Dates Announced for SXSW London Debut Tileyard Education and BMG Production Library Release Four New EPs Showcasing Emerging Songwriters Miranda Lambert Set to Headline Colorado's Ford Amphitheater on Sept. 28 September 2025 Sept. 9-11 – VenuesNow Conference (Las Vegas) Sept. 9-13 – AMERICANAFEST (Nashville) Sept. 10 – Americana Honors and Awards Show (Nashville) Sept. 10 – Trapital Summit (Los Angeles) Sept. 11-14 – Bourbon & Beyond festival (Louisville, Ky.) Sept. 13-14 – Four Chord Music Festival (Washington, Pa.) Sept. 14 – Emmy Awards (Los Angeles) Sept. 16 – CNBC Sport x Boardroom: Game Plan (Santa Monica, Calif.) Sept. 16-20 – IBMA World of Bluegrass…

title: Natalie Grant Signs With Capitol CMG, Announces ‘Christmas’ Album
summary: Contemporary Christian singer-songwriter Natalie Grant has joined Capitol CMG after more than two decades with her previous label home.
body: Five-time GMA Dove Awards female vocalist of the year winner Natalie Grant , known for hits including “King of the World” and “In Better Hands,” is celebrating a new career chapter with a new label home. Grant has joined Capitol Christian Music Group (Capitol CMG), after previously being with Curb/Word Entertainment for more than two decades. Related Faith Sounds: Rimas Publishing Launches Initiative to Promote Christian Music Tileyard Education and BMG Production Library Release Four New EPs Showcasing Emerging Songwriters Miranda Lambert Set to Headline Colorado's Ford Amphitheater on Sept. 28 Capitol CMG is also home to artists including Chris Tomlin, Josiah Queen, Amy Grant, Crowder, TobyMac, Anne Wilson and more. Grant’s signing with Capitol CMG comes as the company was recently part of a greater reorganizing, with Capitol Music Group bringing Capitol CMG and Capitol Records Nashville under the Capitol Music Group Nashville umbrella . Capitol CMG, which includes Motown Gospel and Tamla and distribution operations, continues to be led by CCMG president Brad O’Donnell. Music executive Candice Watkins joined as president of Capitol Records…

title: Busta Rhymes Has Sage Advice For Young Rappers On Their Way Up: ‘Think About What Your Contribution Should Be’
summary: The "Pass the Courvoisier Part II" rapper is definitely feeling the love after Sunday night's (Sep. 7) Rock the Bells Visionary award at the VMAs.
body: Busta Rhymes had every reason to feel good on Sunday night (Sept. 7) at the 2025 MTV VMAs . In addition to being honored with the first-time Rock the Bells Visionary Award — and putting on a show-stopping performance medley of his hits at New York’s UBS Arena — the veteran rapper said he was blessed to be receiving his flowers. Related Busta Rhymes Brings the Heat With His Hits at 2025 VMAs, Receives First Rock the Bells Visionary Award How to Watch the 2025 MTV VMAs Without Cable Here Are All the 2025 MTV VMAs Winners (Updating) “It’s incredible… you know, I’ve never not felt the love, but it’s definitely evolved into new heights,” he told Billboard on the red carpet about the acknowledgement. “It’s a whole other thing to be getting it from your community and your folks and even more so in the abundance that it’s been happening in.” Rhymes wasn’t kidding as he ticked off his recent list of kudos, which include getting his star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame , receiving the Hip-Hop Icon Award at Harlem Week and bering crowned an Elite Icon at the 2025 Caribbean Music Awards, all of which happened in August…
